customHtml.title: A Golden Chance for Fun
customHtml.description:
Gold Horse Casino is a modern gaming destination located in Lloydminster, right on the border of Saskatchewan and Alberta. It has become a vibrant hub for gaming enthusiasts, food lovers, and fans of live entertainment. The spacious venue, covering nearly 50,000 square feet, offers a stylish interior, a welcoming atmosphere, and attentive service that makes every visit memorable.


The gaming floor features over 250 slot machines, live tables for blackjack, poker, and roulette, as well as electronic terminals with digital versions of popular games. The casino frequently hosts promotions with progressive jackpots and cash prize draws. Seasonal events like “Spooky Spins” on Halloween and “Progressive Quick Draws” add excitement and variety to the experience.


On-site, guests can enjoy a cozy restaurant and bar serving local cuisine, including steak and lobster, along with refreshing drinks. Evenings are often enhanced by live performances, including concerts by well-known Canadian artists like The Johner Brothers, especially during festive occasions like New Year’s Eve.


While there is no hotel directly on the premises, several nearby accommodations offer comfortable lodging for casino guests. Conveniently located off Highway 16, the casino is easily accessible to both locals and travelers.


The SIGA Rewards loyalty program allows players to earn points, enjoy free play, receive restaurant discounts, and enter exclusive draws. Registration is simple and free, and membership unlocks a wide range of benefits.


How to Prepare for Your Casino Visit

Visiting a casino is not just about gaming — it’s a special occasion that calls for respect toward the venue’s atmosphere. To avoid any inconvenience and feel confident, it’s important to understand the basic rules, dress code, and entry requirements beforehand.


Most casinos follow a “smart style” policy, meaning your attire should be neat, clean, and appropriate for the setting. While daytime visits may allow more relaxed clothing, evenings typically require a more elegant look. Casinos aim to maintain a comfortable and respectable environment, and guest appearance plays a key role in that.


Proper etiquette is also expected: respect for staff, fellow players, and the gaming process is essential. Entry is allowed only for adults, and ID may be required at the door.


General Visitor Rules

  • • Entry allowed from age 18+ (or 19+, depending on region)
  • • No aggressive or disruptive behavior
  • • Photography of gaming tables and staff is prohibited
  • • Respect other players’ personal space

Dress Code

  • • Men: collared shirt, trousers, dress shoes
  • • Women: dress, blouse with skirt or pants
  • • Not allowed: shorts, sportswear, beach sandals, torn or dirty clothing
  • • Evening visits call for more formal attire

Entry Conditions

  • • ID check may be required
  • • Non-compliance with dress code may result in denied entry
  • • VIP areas and tournaments may require stricter dress standards


SIGA Rewards: Your Path to Exclusive Benefits

The SIGA Rewards loyalty program is a revamped player rewards system designed with guest feedback in mind. Available at all seven SIGA casinos, including Gold Horse Casino, it offers personalized bonuses, exclusive offers, and convenient digital access via a mobile app and website.


SIGA Rewards features four tiers: Emerald, Gold, Platinum, and Diamond. Each tier unlocks new privileges, including restaurant discounts, access to exclusive events, priority service, and special prize draws. Players earn tier credits for every wager: 1 credit for every 5 CAD spent on slots or electronic table games.


The program offers both long-term benefits and instant rewards. For example, new members receive 10 CAD in Free Slot Play upon registration. Regular promotions include large cash giveaways — up to 100,000 CAD in a single draw.


The SIGA Rewards mobile app allows members to track their tier status, join social tournaments, and receive tailored offers, making participation seamless and engaging.


SIGA Rewards Tiers

  • • Emerald: up to 500 credits
  • • Gold: 501 – 10,000 credits
  • • Platinum: 10,001 – 30,000 credits
  • • Diamond: 30,001+ credits

Tier Benefits Include

  • • Increased reward points: +5% / +10% / +15%
  • • SIGA restaurant discounts
  • • Access to exclusive events and draws
  • • Priority lines and preferred parking
  • • Birthday gifts
  • • Presale access to concerts and shows

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Gold Horse Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses & Wins at Gold Horse Casino

Gold Horse Casino delights guests with generous bonuses, cash draws, and themed events that turn gaming into a celebration. Each month features multiple promotions tied to slot machines, live tables, and culinary evenings. The casino embraces seasonal occasions — Halloween, Christmas, New Year’s — to offer players extra chances to win and enjoy unforgettable experiences.


Entertainment includes concerts, parties, dinners with live music, and themed shows. These events often come with cash prizes, free play, and special offers. Even newcomers can start with no-deposit bonuses, while regulars enjoy access to high-value promotions with prize pools reaching hundreds of thousands of dollars.


Bonuses and events

  • • The Next Level — a prize draw series with a total of 250,000 CAD
  • • Spooky Spins (Halloween) — bonus spins with a chance to win up to 313 CAD in Free Slot Play
  • • Progressive Quick Draws — random slot draws awarding 650 CAD cash to each winner
  • • Lobster Feast — gourmet dinner with lobster, mussels, steak, and live music.
  • • New Year’s Eve with The Johner Brothers — live concert, dancing, and late-night dining
  • • Christmas Party with Summer of 69 — Bryan Adams tribute show, dinner, and dancing until midnight

Popular Entertainment at Gold Horse Casino

Gold Horse Casino offers a wide variety of games that appeal to both beginners and seasoned players. The gaming floor features over 250 modern slot machines, including progressive jackpot slots where winnings can reach millions. Live tables offer classic and unique games, while electronic terminals provide digital versions of popular table games for those who prefer a quicker experience.


Favorites among players include Blackjack, Poker, and Roulette, along with exclusive titles like Phil’em Up and Chase the Flush. Electronic terminals allow guests to play baccarat, blackjack, and roulette without waiting for a seat. The casino frequently updates its slot machines with new releases from top providers like IGT, Aristocrat, and AGS.


Live Table Games

  • • Blackjack, Blackjack Switch
  • • Chase the Flush, Phil’em Up
  • • Roulette and Poker (2 cash tables)

Electronic Gaming Terminals

  • • Digital versions of Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat
  • • 18 terminals available during all open hours

Slot Machines

  • • Over 250 machines with various themes
  • • Progressive slots: Smoke Signals (jackpot from 1 to 2 million CAD), Rider Nation (from 50,000 to 100,000 CAD)

Betting at Gold Horse Casino: From Casual to High Stakes

Gold Horse Casino offers flexible betting options suitable for both casual players and high rollers. Minimum bets allow for low-risk entertainment, while higher limits open the door to big wins. Bet ranges vary depending on the game type — slot machines, live tables, or electronic terminals — giving every guest the ability to choose their ideal play style and manage their budget effectively.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines 0.01 CAD 500 CAD
Progressive Slots 0.25 CAD 5 CAD (per spin)
Blackjack $10 $1,000
Blackjack (Live) 5 CAD 500–1,000 CAD
Roulette (Live) 2 CAD 500 CAD
Poker (Live)) 5 CAD 1,000 CAD
Electronic Games 1 CAD 100–250 CAD

Shows & Entertainment at Gold Horse Casino

Gold Horse Casino is more than just a gaming venue — it’s a vibrant entertainment hub in Lloydminster. The casino hosts regular concerts, themed parties, culinary events, and seasonal shows that attract guests from across the region. It offers a unique blend of live music, dining, dancing, and festive atmosphere that makes every visit memorable.


Special attention is given to recurring events, such as the Lobster Feast, corporate Christmas parties, and New Year’s Eve celebrations. In December, guests enjoy two nights with the Summer of 69 tribute band, performing Bryan Adams hits alongside dinner and dancing. On New Year’s Eve, The Johner Brothers take the stage for a country music celebration, complete with a late-night meal and dancing.


The casino also features evening entertainment, including DJ sets after concerts, dancing, and late-night dining. While there’s no dedicated nightclub, many events evolve into dance parties with live music and DJs. Tickets are available online or at the casino’s box office, open daily from 10:00 AM to midnight.


Popular Events & Entertainment

  • • Lobster Feast — lobster, mussels, steak dinner with live music.
  • • Christmas Party with Summer of 69 — Bryan Adams tribute show, dinner, and dancing
  • • New Year’s Eve with The Johner Brothers — concert, festive dinner, dancing, and DJ
  • • Spooky Spins (Halloween) — bonus spins and themed atmosphere
  • • Progressive Quick Draws — random cash draws for slot players
  • • Dallas Smith Live — concert by the country music star
  • • The Beat Goes On — Cher tribute show
  • • Madeline Merlo & Shawn Austin — modern country music night

Taste, Comfort & Stay: Dining and Lodging Near Gold Horse Casino

Gold Horse Casino offers guests more than just gaming — it’s a place to relax, dine, and enjoy quality hospitality. On-site, the Bar & Grill Restaurant serves Canadian favorites like steaks, seafood, and signature appetizers in a cozy setting. Weekend evenings feature culinary events such as the “Lobster Feast,” with lobster, mussels, salads, and warm rolls. For quick bites and drinks, the Deli & Bar is open daily, offering snacks, cocktails, and house-brewed SIGA Lager.


While the casino doesn’t have its own hotel, several nearby accommodations make it easy to stay overnight. Popular choices include Bcminns Lloydminster, Home Inn & Suites, Super 8 by Wyndham, and Border Inn and Suites — all within 1 km of the casino. These hotels offer comfortable rooms, breakfast options, and amenities for both leisure and business travelers, making Gold Horse Casino a perfect destination for an evening out and a restful night.


Dining & Lodging Options

  • • Bar & Grill Restaurant — full menu, cozy ambiance, evening food events
  • • Deli & Bar — snacks and drinks, open daily from 11:00 AM to 2:00 AM
  • • Kookum’s Kitchen — Indigenous-inspired dishes available at the Deli
  • • Bcminns Lloydminster — 800 m from casino, comfortable rooms
  • • Home Inn & Suites — business-friendly hotel, 700 m away
  • • Super 8 by Wyndham — budget option right next to the casino
  • • Border Inn and Suites — spacious rooms, fireplace, breakfast, 1.3 km away

items.title: Do I need to register to play?
items.answer: No, registration is optional but unlocks bonuses.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit/debit cards, and internal top-up systems.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are in Canadian dollars (CAD).

items.title: Can I reserve tables?
items.answer: Yes, reservations are available for VIP and events.

items.title: Is the casino open 24/7?
items.answer: No, hours are 10:00 AM to 3:00 AM (Fri–Sat until 4:00 AM).
